吹.definition: to blow; to play a wind instrument; to blast; to puff; to boast; to brag; to end in failure; to fall through

吹了.definition: failed; busted; to have not succeeded; to have died; to have parted company; to have chilled (of a relationship)

吹冷風.definition: to blow cold; damping expectations by discouraging or realistic words

吹哨.definition: to blow a whistle; to whistle

吹喇叭.definition: (lit.) blowing the trumpet; (fig.) to praise sb; (slang) to give a blowjob

吹拂.definition: to brush; to caress (of breeze); to praise

吹拍.definition: to resort to bragging and flattering; abbr. for 吹牛拍馬|吹牛拍马[chui1 niu2 pai1 ma3]

吹捧.definition: to flatter; to laud sb's accomplishments; adulation

吹毛求疵.definition: lit. to blow apart the hairs upon a fur to discover any defect (idiom); fig. to be fastidious; nitpick

吹燈拔蠟.definition: lit. to blow out the lamp and put out the candle (idiom); fig. to die; to bite the dust; to be over and done with

吹牛.definition: to talk big; to shoot off one's mouth; to chat (dialect)

吹牛拍馬.definition: to resort to bragging and flattering

吹竽手.definition: player of the yu 竽[yu2] (free reed wind instrument)

吹簫.definition: to play the xiao 簫|箫[xiao1] (mouth organ); to beg while playing pipes; cf politician Wu Zixu 伍子胥[Wu3 Zi3 xu1], c. 520 BC destitute refugee in Wu town, 吳市吹簫|吴市吹箫[Wu2 shi4 chui1 xiao1]; to busk; virtuoso piper wins a beauty, cf 玉人吹簫|玉人吹箫[yu4 ren2 chui1 xiao1]; (slang) fellatio; blowjob

吹簫乞食.definition: to beg while playing the xiao 簫|箫[xiao1] (mouth organ); cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥[Wu3 Zi3 xu1], destitute refugee from Chu 楚[Chu3], busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician

吹糠見米.definition: instant results; lit. blow the husk and see the rice

吹臺.definition: (coll.) to fall through; to result in failure; (of a relationship) to break up

吹襲.definition: (of wind) to blow fiercely; (of a storm) to strike

吹鼓手.definition: (old) musicians at a wedding cortege or funeral procession; (fig.) trumpeter of sb's praises; booster
